name: PONG (itch) (Meter Games)
description:
Continuing down the nostalgia path that started with "Tone-tris", then became expanded by "Pac-Man", I've gone all the way back to the original game. It's a clone of PONG.

This game is super basic. I know all my games are basic, but this one takes the cake. Only a single sound effect, no menu screens, very simple GUI. It does feature a pause function, but it's barely more than just the function. Additionally, the ball speed will increase slightly every 20 seconds during a single round. It becomes reset once either the player or computer misses a shot.

That's pretty much it, I made this game in a single day, once again following the tutorials from The Weekly Coder. I expanded on his design and added the sound effect, along with some extra text for controls and my personal tag. Pretty proud of that. While I always say I might return to tweak and fix functionality of my games, I wouldn't hold your breath on this title. It's essentially complete as is.
